thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 3 of 178
thread.title: Dani

author: Dani
title: Dani
text: Living away from family and remotely in Australia means either paying huge amounts in dog kennel fees or hopefully getting someone to help out, luckily I was told about trusted house sitters by a local here and I couldn't have been happier. The sitters treated it as a job and looked after our house and pets. So we could relax being away knowing they had loads of experience house sitting. Best part was coming home to a spotless. Our sitters happily picked us from the airport as well which helped save in taxi fees. I'd recommend to anyone who has to leave home as it gave us peace of mind, and as I said the sitters treated it as a job and looked after the house.
